languages.text: "Его могущество мнимо и построено на лжи, помноженной на раболепие его прихвостней. Мы не предавали его, {name}. Мы свергали тирана".
"His strength is feigned and built on lies amplified by the servility of his lackeys. Our actions were not a betrayal, {name}. We were overthrowing a tyrant."
languages.original_text: "Его могущество мнимо и построено на лжи, помноженной на раболепие его прихвостней. Мы не предавали его, {name}. Мы свергали тирана".

traits.locale_text: "His strength is feigned and built on lies amplified by the servility of his lackeys. Our actions were not a betrayal, {name}. We were overthrowing a tyrant."
"His strength is feigned and built on lies amplified by the servility of his lackeys. Our actions were not a betrayal, {name}. We were overthrowing a tyrant."
"His strength is feigned and built on lies amplified by the servility of his lackeys. Our actions were not a betrayal, {name}. We were overthrowing a tyrant."
"His strength is feigned and built on lies amplified by the servility of his lackeys. Our actions were not a betrayal, {name}. We were overthrowing a tyrant."
"His strength is feigned and built on lies amplified by the servility of his lackeys. Our actions were not a betrayal, {name}. We were overthrowing a tyrant."

languages.text: « Sa force n'est qu'une illusion bâtie sur des mensonges amplifiés par la servilité de ses larbins. Nous n'avons trahi personne, {name}. Nous cherchions simplement à renverser un tyran. »
languages.original_text: "His strength is feigned and built on lies amplified by the servility of his lackeys. Our actions were not a betrayal, {name}. We were overthrowing a tyrant."

traits.locale_text: « Sa force n'est qu'une illusion bâtie sur des mensonges amplifiés par la servilité de ses larbins. Nous n'avons trahi personne, {name}. Nous cherchions simplement à renverser un tyran. »

languages.text: «Su fuerza es una ilusión nacida de la mentira y amplificada por la servidumbre de sus lacayos. Nuestros actos no fueron una traición, {name}. Derrocamos a un tirano».
languages.original_text: "His strength is feigned and built on lies amplified by the servility of his lackeys. Our actions were not a betrayal, {name}. We were overthrowing a tyrant."

traits.locale_text: «Su fuerza es una ilusión nacida de la mentira y amplificada por la servidumbre de sus lacayos. Nuestros actos no fueron una traición, {name}. Derrocamos a un tirano».

languages.text: 「彼の力は見せかけのものであり、配下の卑劣さによって増幅された嘘の上に成り立ったものだ。我らの行動は裏切りではない、{name}。暴君を打倒したのだ」
languages.original_text: "His strength is feigned and built on lies amplified by the servility of his lackeys. Our actions were not a betrayal, {name}. We were overthrowing a tyrant."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の力は見せかけのものであり、配下の卑劣さによって増幅された嘘の上に成り立ったものだ。我らの行動は裏切りではない、{name}。暴君を打倒したのだ」

languages.text: “他的力量是虚假的，建立在谎言之上，而那些走狗的奴性又放大了那些谎言。我们的所作所为并非背叛，{name}，我们仅仅是在推翻暴君罢了。”
languages.original_text: "His strength is feigned and built on lies amplified by the servility of his lackeys. Our actions were not a betrayal, {name}. We were overthrowing a tyrant."

traits.locale_text: “他的力量是虚假的，建立在谎言之上，而那些走狗的奴性又放大了那些谎言。我们的所作所为并非背叛，{name}，我们仅仅是在推翻暴君罢了。”

languages.text: "Seine Stärke ist vorgetäuscht und basiert auf Lügen, die von der Unterwürfigkeit seiner Lakaien verstärkt werden. Was wir getan haben, war kein Verrat, {name}. Wir haben einen Tyrannen gestürzt."
languages.original_text: "His strength is feigned and built on lies amplified by the servility of his lackeys. Our actions were not a betrayal, {name}. We were overthrowing a tyrant."

traits.locale_text: "Seine Stärke ist vorgetäuscht und basiert auf Lügen, die von der Unterwürfigkeit seiner Lakaien verstärkt werden. Was wir getan haben, war kein Verrat, {name}. Wir haben einen Tyrannen gestürzt."

languages.text: "Gücü hayal ürünüdür ve yardakçılarının yalakaca sözleriyle abartılmış yalanlardır. Bizim eylemlerimiz ihanet değil {name}. Biz bir tiranı tahtından ediyoruz."
languages.original_text: "His strength is feigned and built on lies amplified by the servility of his lackeys. Our actions were not a betrayal, {name}. We were overthrowing a tyrant."
